Email.title: Email
Email.description: This input is an email. Must be strictly in an email format. Input is retrieved from the context variable of the Messaging Session. This input uses the Email__c field of the current messaging session.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: This input is the name of the user. It is retrieved from the context variable of the Messaging Session. This input uses the Name__c field of the current messaging session.
